DOC.brief_summary: The aim of study is to compare triple tourniquet vs. single tourniquet to reduce blood loss at open myomectomy.
DOC.detailed_description: Single tourniquet is applied to uterine isthmus to occlude uterine arteries. Triple tourniquet is applied to both infundibulopelvic ligaments and uterine isthmus.
DOC.criteria: uterine myoma >12 weeks Pedunculated myoma, broad ligament myoma Hb<10.5 g /dl
